coreAttributes.authorTag: A tag discreetly sewn into the sirwal's inner lining informs you that it was made by 'SectoniaServant'.
coreAttributes.name: Gerudo sirwal
coreAttributes.description: A sirwal that seems to come from a special race called the Gerudo. It's meant for vai. It's designed to provide protection against the desert heat.

replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.legs] through the sleeves of the sirwal as you pull it on [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the sirwal through [npc.her] [npc.legs+].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.legs] through the sleeves of the sirwal.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the sleeves of the sirwal through your [pc.legs]
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the sleeves of the sirwal onto [npc2.name]'s [npc2.legs+]

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your sirwal back up, covering your groin.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] sirwal back up to cover [npc.her] groin.

displacementText.playerSelf: You unbuckle the belt on the sirwal, before shuffling it down.
displacementText.playerNPC: You unbuckle the belt on [npc.Name]'s sirwal, before shuffling it down.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly unbuckle the belt on [npc.Name]'s sirwal, before pushing it down.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] unbuckles the belt on [npc.her] sirwal, before shuffling it down.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] unbuckles the belt on your sirwal, before shuffling it down.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] roughly unbuckles the belt on your sirwal before pushing it down.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] unbuckles the belt on [npc2.name]'s sirwal, before shuffling it down.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] roughly unbuckles the belt on [npc2.name]'s sirwal before pushing it down.

replacementText.playerSelf: You buckle the belt on the sirwal, before pulling it up.
replacementText.playerNPC: You buckle the belt on [npc.Name]'s sirwal, before pulling it up.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You roughly buckle the belt on [npc.Name]'s sirwal, before yanking it up.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] buckles the belt on [npc.her] sirwal, before pulling it up.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] buckles the belt on your sirwal, before pulling it up.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] roughly buckles the belt on your sirwal before yanking it up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] buckles the belt on [npc2.name]'s sirwal, before pulling it up.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] roughly buckles the belt on [npc2.name]'s sirwal before yanking it up.
